Select activity Tuesday, 10.00-12.00 h | Room EB 224 | Prof. Dr. Enrico Gualini
The seminar addresses the issue of citizen participation in planning processes in a critical respective.
For issues regarding ISIS, contact Vanessa Vogel (student assistant) | v.vogel@tu-berlin.de
All relevant details will be communicated through ISIS before the beginning of the seminar which is on April 16th 2024.

To ensure the start of the seminar and an adequate communication on its requirements, all participants are required to register to the seminar on the ISIS platform before the first session (password protection will be activated after registration has occurred).
Please enrol yourself in this course by choosing the group '
' and by filling out the questionnaire '
' provided there. This mandatory enrolment starts at April 16th.

In summer term 2024, the seminar Planning as Political Process is given in two different versions – respectively called Seminar A (10.00-12.00) and Seminar B (12.00-14.00) – each with a different thematic title and focus. Both seminars are equivalent in terms of requirements, examination form and credits as part of Module Planning Theory A.
Participants are asked to make their choice for either seminar before the first meeting, by enrolling and
in the dedicated ISIS course. Participation in each seminar is limited to 30.
Places in either seminar are assigned on a first come-first serve basis. No changes are made after enrollment is completed.
